addpoints.description: Adds the specified amount of points to the specified member or all members.

alias.description: Set your own custom aliases for any command.
alias.usage:
- `{PREFIX}alias` to view all aliases
- `{PREFIX}alias set <New Alias> <Command Name>` to add a new alias for a specific command
- `{PREFIX}alias remove <Alias>` to remove an existing alias

blackjack.description: Play blackjack with the bot. Get as close to 21 without going over and you'll win! Ties are considered as losses.

commands.description: Check the disabled commands and enable/disable commands.
commands.usage:
- `{PREFIX}commands` to display all currently disabled commands
- `{PREFIX}commands <disable/enable> <Command>` to disable/enable commands.

cooldowns.description: Check all the custom cooldowns of a command and add new cooldowns.
cooldowns.usage:
- `{PREFIX}cooldowns <Command>` to display all modified cooldowns for a command and update them.
- `{PREFIX}cooldowns <Command> set <Role> <Cooldown>` to set the cooldown for this command to a certain value.
- `{PREFIX}cooldowns <Command> clear <Role>` to use the default cooldown for this command.

daily.description: Gives users their daily reward of `1,000` points.

gamble.description: Test your luck and gamble your points.

give.description: Gives another user your pina coladas.

names.categoriesHelp: Use `{PREFIX}help [category]` to get more info on a category, for example: `{PREFIX}help misc`
names.isDisabled: This command is currently disabled in this server.

help.usage:
To get help on a specific command, use `{PREFIX}help [Command Name]` (without the [ ]).
For a full list of all commands, simply use `{PREFIX}help`.

**Note:** `<>` means required arguments. `[]` means optional arguments.

points.description: Displays how many points you or another user has and current ranking.

setcolor.usage:
- `{PREFIX}setcolor` to view your color and all available colors.
- `{PREFIX}setcolor <New Color>` to set your color.

setgamblingchannel.description: Sets the server's gambling channel to enable gambling.

setpoints.description: Sets the specified amount of points to the specified member or all members.

setprefix.description: Set a new prefix for your server.

slots.description: Test your luck and play the slots. Each slot win gives you 4 times the amount you bet.

top.description: See the top 10 gamblers with the most pina coladas.
